content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility and broad participation. Vol: 13.1%; Breadth: 5/8 sectors positive.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Banking & Finance leading on strong, broad gains: GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +5.38% | 1M: +10.19%) ABOVE TREND; Transportation showing pockets of strength: TAVHL (1W: +5.52% | 1M: +11.18%) ABOVE TREND.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Energy & Chemicals and Holding & Investment lag despite pockets of strength; TUPRS (1W: -0.69% | 1M: -4.93%) BELOW TREND, DOHOL (1W: -6.78% | 1M: -0.74%) BELOW TREND.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
VAKBN (1W: +6.74% | 1M: -0.63%) RECOVERY; YKBNK (1W: +6.66% | 1M: +3.14%) ABOVE TREND; GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%) ABOVE TREND; TAVHL (1W: +5.52% | 1M: +11.18%) ABOVE TREND; AKBNK (1W: +5.38% | 1M: +10.19%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
DOHOL (1W: -6.78% | 1M: -0.74%) BELOW TREND; TKFEN (1W: -6.16% | 1M: +5.31%) CORRECTION; PGSUS (1W: -5.57% | 1M: -3.32%) BELOW TREND; TRALT (1W: -4.46% | 1M: +18.46%) CORRECTION; KRDMD (1W: -3.41% | 1M: +1.16%) CORRECTION.

6. Momentum Stocks?
Big swings this week: DOHOL (1W: -6.78% | 1M: -0.74%) BELOW TREND, VAKBN (1W: +6.74% | 1M: -0.63%) RECOVERY, YKBNK (1W: +6.66% | 1M: +3.14%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%) ABOVE TREND, TKFEN (1W: -6.16% | 1M: +5.31%) CORRECTION.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banking is the market engine; AKBNK (1W: +5.38% | 1M: +10.19%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +5.19% | 1M: +3.60%) ABOVE TREND, VAKBN (1W: +6.74% | 1M: -0.63%) RECOVERY — momentum intact but watch profit-taking.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry mixed: TOASO (1W: +4.59% | 1M: +12.16%) ABOVE TREND and ASELS (1W: +3.37% | 1M: +23.83%) ABOVE TREND lead, while ARCLK (1W: -3.05% | 1M: -1.78%) BELOW TREND and VESTL (1W: -1.93% | 1M: -8.63%) BELOW TREND signal divergence in cyclicals.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Energy underperforms on the week; TRALT (1W: -4.46% | 1M: +18.46%) CORRECTION shows profit-taking after a strong month, TUPRS (1W: -0.69% | 1M: -4.93%) BELOW TREND and SISE (1W: -1.36% | 1M: +4.54%) CORRECTION — selective opportunities but higher risk.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Overweight Banking & Finance and select Industrials (TOASO, ASELS) for cyclical upside; trim lagging Energy/Holdings and harvest gains in high-momentum names after recent runs. Keep stops tight on names in CORRECTION or BELOW TREND.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
GARAN (1W: +6.25% | 1M: +5.57%) ABOVE TREND for continuation; TRALT (1W: -4.46% | 1M: +18.46%) CORRECTION for mean-reversion or further pullback; DOHOL (1W: -6.78% | 1M: -0.74%) BELOW TREND for downside risk; TAVHL (1W: +5.52% | 1M: +11.18%) ABOVE TREND as a transportation play.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Banking & Finance for leadership continuation; Transportation for reopening/cyclicals; Energy & Chemicals for dispersion and relative-value opportunities.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Market reaction to global rates and local macro (CBRT commentary, CPI) will be the primary trigger; monitor XU100 near short-term 20-day MA for support and recent highs for resistance. Earnings updates and sector-specific catalysts (fuel margins for TUPRS, order flows for TOASO/ASELS) are near-term event risks.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Risk-on regime with low volatility and broad leadership from banks; AKBNK/GARAN/YKBNK are favored while Energy and some holdings lag. Watch TRALT and DOHOL for volatile reversals and keep downside protection on names in CORRECTION or BELOW TREND.
